name: I was here
description: Test your ingenuity and explore the world from your sofa with our trivia game "I Was Here", where the objective is to guess the place from the photos.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP/7/8/10 Processor: 2 Ghz Dual Core Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: integrated DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: Any Additional Notes: Minimal resolution - 1024 x 768
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/10 Processor: Intel i3 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: integrated DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 3 GB available space
